title: 1 Acre Beautiful Lake Front Land For Sale At Kalpitiya
details:
Property Ref: Lake-9

✮✮✮✮✮ Minimum Purchase 1 Acres ✮✮✮✮✮

This is a beautiful 9 acre beautiful lake front land that' is situated by what is called the "Nachchiamma Gange" which is a large inland body of standing water. Many local and foreign investors have already bought several plots in the area recognizing its potential for future investment opportunities. There is already a small family resort in operational near the plot.

The land is located just 10 minutes (3 km) from the Kudawa beach 10 minutes (4 km) from the kite lagoon and 8 minutes (5.5 Km) from the Kalpitiya town center.

Away from Kalpitiya town, this land presents a beautiful landscape. The calm water front, lush green grass and the serine environment makes the land uniquely beautiful.

The land is suitable for private holiday bungalows or any other tourism projects.

Now available for immediate sale with-

- Clear Deed And Title (Sinnakkara with more than 30 years title )
- Good Road Access
- Electricity
- Water

Asking price is Rs.5.5 Mln/Acre

For more information or to arrange a viewing please contact us on
0094 77 77 33 823.

Thanks for looking :)
